languages.text: "Похвально, весьма похвально. Однако очень и очень многие считают, что труд во славу Его начинается с радения над собственными словами. Помните об этом, когда вам представится привилегия вновь обсуждать Его с верными слугами {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}".

traits.locale_text: "Похвально, весьма похвально. Однако очень и очень многие считают, что труд во славу Его начинается с радения над собственными словами. Помните об этом, когда вам представится привилегия вновь обсуждать Его с верными слугами Империума".

languages.text: "That is commendable, quite so. However, there are many, many who believe that toils in His name start with diligence in choosing one's own words. Remember that when next you are presented with the privilege of conversing about Him with loyal servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."
languages.original_text: "Похвально, весьма похвально. Однако очень и очень многие считают, что труд во славу Его начинается с радения над собственными словами. Помните об этом, когда вам представится привилегия вновь обсуждать Его с верными слугами {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}".

Remember that when next you are presented with the privilege of conversing about Him with loyal servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."

"That is commendable, quite so. However, there are many, many who believe that toils in His name start with diligence in choosing one's own words. Remember that when next you are presented with the privilege of conversing about Him with loyal servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."

"That is commendable, quite so. However, there are many, many who believe that toils in His name start with diligence in choosing one's own words. Remember that when next you are presented with the privilege of conversing about Him with loyal servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."

"That is commendable, quite so. However, there are many, many who believe that toils in His name start with diligence in choosing one's own words. Remember that when next you are presented with the privilege of conversing about Him with loyal servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."

"That is commendable, quite so. However, there are many, many who believe that toils in His name start with diligence in choosing one's own words. Remember that when next you are presented with the privilege of conversing about Him with loyal servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."

languages.text: “这确实很值得赞扬，相当值得赞扬。然而，有太多太多人认为，如果打算以帝皇的名义做事，首先必须审慎地选择话语。如果您再次遇到{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的忠诚仆人，打算谈论关于祂的事情，希望您能将我的忠告谨记在心。”
languages.original_text: "That is commendable, quite so. However, there are many, many who believe that toils in His name start with diligence in choosing one's own words. Remember that when next you are presented with the privilege of conversing about Him with loyal servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."

traits.locale_text: “这确实很值得赞扬，相当值得赞扬。然而，有太多太多人认为，如果打算以帝皇的名义做事，首先必须审慎地选择话语。如果您再次遇到{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的忠诚仆人，打算谈论关于祂的事情，希望您能将我的忠告谨记在心。”

languages.text: «Eso es loable, sin duda. No obstante, muchísimas personas creen que el servicio a Su nombre comienza por la elección correcta de nuestras palabras. Recuérdelo cuando tenga la ocasión de conversar sobre Él con otros leales sirvientes del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}».
languages.original_text: "That is commendable, quite so. However, there are many, many who believe that toils in His name start with diligence in choosing one's own words. Remember that when next you are presented with the privilege of conversing about Him with loyal servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."

traits.locale_text: «Eso es loable, sin duda. No obstante, muchísimas personas creen que el servicio a Su nombre comienza por la elección correcta de nuestras palabras. Recuérdelo cuando tenga la ocasión de conversar sobre Él con otros leales sirvientes del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}».

languages.text: 「それは賞賛に値する本当に素晴らしいことです。しかし、実に多くの人が神帝陛下の名のもとに働くことは、自分の言葉を慎重に選ぶことから始まると信じているのです。次回、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の忠実なしもべたちと神について話す特権があなたに与えられた時には、これを覚えておいてください」
languages.original_text: "That is commendable, quite so. However, there are many, many who believe that toils in His name start with diligence in choosing one's own words. Remember that when next you are presented with the privilege of conversing about Him with loyal servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."

traits.locale_text: 「それは賞賛に値する素晴らしいことです。本当にそうです。しかし、実に多くの人が神の名における労苦は、自分の言葉を慎重に選ぶことから始まると信じているのです。次回、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の忠実なしもべたちと神について話す特権があなたに与えられた時には、これを覚えておいてください」
「それは賞賛に値する本当に素晴らしいことです。しかし、実に多くの人が神帝陛下の名のもとに働くことは、自分の言葉を慎重に選ぶことから始まると信じているのです。次回、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の忠実なしもべたちと神について話す特権があなたに与えられた時には、これを覚えておいてください」

languages.original_text: "That is commendable, quite so. However, there are many, many who believe that toils in His name start with diligence in choosing one's own words. Remember that when next you are presented with the privilege of conversing about Him with loyal servants of the Imperium."

languages.text: « C'est tout à votre honneur, mais nombreux sont ceux qui estiment que servir l'Empereur commence par savoir faire preuve de réserve dans le choix de ses propos. Souvenez-vous-en la prochaine fois que vous aurez le privilège de parler de Lui avec de fidèles serviteurs de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. »
languages.original_text: "That is commendable, quite so. However, there are many, many who believe that toils in His name start with diligence in choosing one's own words. Remember that when next you are presented with the privilege of conversing about Him with loyal servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."

traits.locale_text: « C'est tout à votre honneur, mais nombreux sont ceux qui estiment que servir l'Empereur commence par savoir faire preuve de réserve dans le choix de ses propos. Souvenez-vous-en la prochaine fois que vous aurez le privilège de parler de Lui avec de fidèles serviteurs de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. »

languages.text: "Das ist lobenswert, keine Frage. Andererseits gibt es sehr, sehr viele, die glauben, dass die Arbeit in Seinem Namen damit beginnt, die eigenen Worte mit Bedacht zu wählen. Denkt daran, wenn Euch wieder das Privileg zukommt, mit treuen Dienern des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} über Ihn zu sprechen."
languages.original_text: "That is commendable, quite so. However, there are many, many who believe that toils in His name start with diligence in choosing one's own words. Remember that when next you are presented with the privilege of conversing about Him with loyal servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist lobenswert, keine Frage. Andererseits gibt es sehr, sehr viele, die glauben, dass die Arbeit in Seinem Namen damit beginnt, die eigenen Worte mit Bedacht zu wählen. Denkt daran, wenn Euch wieder das Privileg zukommt, mit treuen Dienern des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} über Ihn zu sprechen."

languages.text: "Takdire şayan, hem de ziyadesiyle. Lakin pek çokları O'nun uğruna çabanın, kişinin sarf ettiği sözlere özen göstermesiyle başladığına inanıyor. Bir daha size {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk'un{/g} sadık bir hizmetkârıyla O'nun hakkında konuşma ayrıcalığı sunulduğunda bu sözlerimi hatırlayın."
languages.original_text: "That is commendable, quite so. However, there are many, many who believe that toils in His name start with diligence in choosing one's own words. Remember that when next you are presented with the privilege of conversing about Him with loyal servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."

traits.locale_text: "Takdire şayan, hem de ziyadesiyle. Lakin pek çokları O'nun uğruna çabanın, kişinin sarf ettiği sözlere özen göstermesiyle başladığına inanıyor. Bir daha size {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g}'un sadık bir hizmetkârıyla O'nun hakkında konuşma ayrıcalığı sunulduğunda bu sözlerimi hatırlayın."
